          <title>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Elastischer Zusammenstoß</string>

          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prikaz elastičnega trka pri trku dveh delcev pri čemer eden miruje.</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of elastic collision between two particles when one is not moving.</string>
